text:
*[Bug 18654] xyTable fails when both x and y are NA*
<https://bugs.r-project.org/show_bug.cgi?id=18654>

--- Comment #9 from Paul Murrell (<mailto:paul@stat.auckland.ac.nz|paul@stat.auckland.ac.nz>) ---
Thanks for the updated patch.  It is looking good.

Could you please provide either an xyTable.Rout.save for the tests or add, for
example, some stopifnot() calls so that make check-all will at least report or
ideally throw errors if the output of the tests changes.

elements.text: [Bug 18654] xyTable fails when both x and y are NA
